title: The emperor
text: does not share your optimistic appraisal of the situation

title: It's power to create problems has certainly been confirm
text: A city destroyed, and an imperial facility openly attacked?

title: All too easy
text: maybe you are not as strong as the emperor thought

title: You are in command now
text: Admiral Piett. Make ready to land our troops beyond their energy field, and deploy the fleet, so that nothing gets off the system
